title: Silenced
content:
Silenced Becomes unable to cast verbal Spells.

Becomes unable to cast verbal Spells.

Silenced is a Status Effect in Baldur's Gate 3. Status Effects are the different conditions that can affect characters in both positive and negative ways.

Silenced Information

Effect: Becomes unable to cast verbal Spells.
